## Data Summary

```{r}
# Create single vector of questions and data frame of observations
allQuestions <- cbind(catQuestions, textQuestions, multRespQuestions)
allQuestions <- allQuestions %>% select(colnames(reorderedColumns))
allData <- cbind(catColumns, textColumns, multRespCols)
allData <- allData %>% select(colnames(reorderedColumns))

# Loop to go through columns and print relevant data
for (i in 1:ncol(allData)) {
    cat(colnames(allData)[i], "-", allQuestions[1, i], "\n\n")
    if (is.factor(allData[, i])) {
        print(summary(allData[, i]))
    } else {
        for (j in 1:nrow(allData)) {
            if (!is.na(allData[j, i])) {
                cat(paste0("\"", allData[j, i], "\""), "\n")
            }
        }
    }
    cat("\n\n\n")
}
```
